prompts: Create a molten lava creature that embodies the essence of fire and heat.
I want a Pokemon that resembles a blob of lava with bright yellow eyes.
Generate a fiery creature that can thrive in volcanic environments.
Make a small, fire-type creature that flows like magma.
Imagine a Pokemon with a body made of molten rock and flames erupting from it.
Design a unique Pokemon that has a vibrant orange color and a smooth, amorphous shape.
Give me a fire-type Pokemon that looks like it could be a part of a volcanic landscape.
